content: Arsenal + Southampton + SPFCSundayFootball Prediction Contest!Game 1:  Arsenal v Everton @ 3:00pm GMT  Game 2:  Southampton v Leicester City @ 3:00pm GMT  Game 3:  São Paulo FC v Corinthians @ 7:00pm GMT  Rulesa)  Predict the minute of the 1st Goal Scored (doesn't matter which team scores)This Prediction will be for all 3 gamesb)  Predict the Exact Final Score with winnerExampleGame 1:  20'  2-0 ArsenalGame 2:  20'  2-0 SouthamptonGame 3:  20'  2-0 São Paulo FCPrizesThe closest 1st Goal Scored prediction wins a 1 mBTC Free Bet!If you correctly predict the exact time of the 1st Goal Scored and successfully predict the Final Score, your Free Bet will be for 2 mBTC!(Small print)* The declared winners are final and up to my discretion *** Prizes will be prioritized based on overall general forum participation and activity ***** Void if no goals are scored ***
